Key Match Events: Mohamed Bayo gave Guinea a shock early lead.
François Kamano was sent off in first-half stoppage time following a VAR review for standing on Frank Magri’s foot.
Frank Magri’s header equalized for Cameroon six minutes into the second half.
Guinea midfielder Aguibou Camara was brought down by Cameroon defender Harold Moukoudi, who was shown a yellow card.
Guinea keeper Ibrahim Koné saved from Karl Toko at point-blank range to preserve the draw.
Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon was missing injured captain Vincent Aboubakar.
Fabrice Ondoa started in goal for Cameroon due to travel problems faced by André Onana.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bad weather caused travel problems for André Onana, who had flown in from Manchester on a private jet but was further delayed and not named in the match squad.
